member.name: T:Cloak.NUnit.Behavior
member.summary: Base implementation of NUnit test fixtures written in the Given-When-Then style

member.name: M:Cloak.NUnit.Behavior.SetUp
member.summary: Initializes this text fixture by executing Given and When

member.name: M:Cloak.NUnit.Behavior.Given
member.summary: When implemented in a derived class, sets up the state for the tested action

member.name: M:Cloak.NUnit.Behavior.When
member.summary: When implemented in a derived class, performs the tested action

member.name: T:Cloak.NUnit.ThenAttribute
member.summary: Indicates an assertion on the result of a tested action
